# Module: tf.optimizers


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">
</table>



Built-in optimizer classes.

<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


## Modules

[`schedules`](../tf/optimizers/schedules) module: Public API for tf.keras.optimizers.schedules namespace.

## Classes

[`class Adadelta`](../tf/keras/optimizers/Adadelta): Optimizer that implements the Adadelta algorithm.

[`class Adagrad`](../tf/keras/optimizers/Adagrad): Optimizer that implements the Adagrad algorithm.

[`class Adam`](../tf/keras/optimizers/Adam): Optimizer that implements the Adam algorithm.

[`class Adamax`](../tf/keras/optimizers/Adamax): Optimizer that implements the Adamax algorithm.

[`class Ftrl`](../tf/keras/optimizers/Ftrl): Optimizer that implements the FTRL algorithm.

[`class Nadam`](../tf/keras/optimizers/Nadam): Optimizer that implements the NAdam algorithm.

[`class Optimizer`](../tf/keras/optimizers/Optimizer): Updated base class for optimizers.

[`class RMSprop`](../tf/keras/optimizers/RMSprop): Optimizer that implements the RMSprop algorithm.

[`class SGD`](../tf/keras/optimizers/SGD): Stochastic gradient descent and momentum optimizer.

## Functions

[`deserialize(...)`](../tf/keras/optimizers/deserialize): Inverse of the `serialize` function.

[`get(...)`](../tf/keras/optimizers/get): Retrieves a Keras Optimizer instance.
